text:
e="preserve">Cornelius Alvin Smith (born 7 April 1937) is a Bahamian politician. He is the 10th and current Governor-General of the Bahamas since 28 June 2019.
Smith was the Ambassador to the United States starting in 2008. He was also Minister of Transport, and Aviation of the Bahamas. In 2018, he was sworn in as the deputy Governor General.
